abstract: Microsoft reported strong sales but its financial results were muddled by the late arrival of important new products.
snippet: Microsoft reported strong sales but its financial results were muddled by the late arrival of important new products.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft yesterday reported strong sales for its latest quarter and a profit that slightly surpassed Wall Street estimates, but its financial results were muddled by the late arrival of important new products.

headline.main: Delays Limit Robust Sales at Microsoft
headline.print_headline: Delays Limit Robust Sales At Microsoft
